member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.UnityTypeElement
member.summary: A class used to manage the contents of a <type> node in the configuration file.
member.remarks: Using the Type element in configuration can result in both type mappings and singletons being registered. If a name is specified, it is used for both the type mapping and singleton setting.

member.summary: The actual object for the mapTo element in the configuration file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.UnityTypeElement.Lifetime
member.summary: Sets the lifetime for the given type and name. Transient means to create a new instance every type and is the default. Singleton means to return the same instance on every request.
member.remarks: When configuring a singleton, if both the type and mapTo attributes are specified, the SetSingleton call will be done on the type specified in the mapTo attribute. Otherwise it'll be done on the type specified in the Type attribute.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.Properties.Resources.ConversionNotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Can only convert to and from strings, not type {0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.Properties.Resources.GenericParameterArrayNotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The value element named <{1}> is not available with generic arrays in the property or parameter named "{0}"..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.Properties.Resources.GenericParameterNotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The value element named <{1}> is not available with generic parameters in the property or parameter named "{0}"..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.Properties.Resources.InvalidConfiguration
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The configuration that leads to the current state is invalid and should have been checked during deserialization..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.Properties.Resources.MustGiveValueOrDependency
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The configuration file does not specify a <value> or <dependency> element for the property or parameter named "{0}". You must specify one of them but not both..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.Properties.Resources.MustHaveOnlyOneOfValueOrDependency
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The configuration file specifies both a <value> and a <dependency>element for the property or parameter named "{0}". You must specify only one of these..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.Properties.Resources.MustNotProvideATypeForDependencyIfBelongsToGeneric
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The configuration file includes a <dependency> element that specifies a type for the generic parameter "{0}"..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.Properties.Resources.NeitherParameterTypeNorGenericParameterNameSpecified
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The configuration file must include a value for one of "parameterType" and "genericParameterName" for the property or parameter named "{0}"..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.Properties.Resources.OnlyOneOfParameterTypeAndGenericParameterNameAllowed
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The configuration file includes values for more than one of "parameterType" and "genericParameterName" for the property or parameter named "{0}". You must specify only one of these..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.Properties.Resources.OnlyOneValueElementAllowed
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The configuration file includes more than one value element for the property or parameter named "{0}"..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.Properties.Resources.ParameterTypeIsNotArray
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The configuration file includes a property or parameter which is configured with an array value but has type {0} which is not an array type. ({1} line {2}).
